p:
Silva Junior et al.
96 found a dichloromethane extract from the roots of Gallesia gorazema to elicit 93% viral inhibition of HSV-1 at its maximum non-cytotoxic concentration of 100 Î¼g/ml, but had no effect against HSV-2. An ethanolic extract from the leaves of Gallesia gorazema was also tested, but failed to demonstrate any antiherpetic activity against HSV-1 or HSV-2.
